name: ReligiousSorcery
description:
Allows the player to craft `sacrificial blood` or `soul essense` from religious items at a rate of 10 religious item to 1 sacrificial blood or 5 soul essense.
Feat is available after unlocking basic sorcery.  Find it in the Sorcery section.  Costs 1 point.

Reason: I think it's reasonable that 10 NPC kills equate to a single sacrifice at the alter.  But dragging thralls takes so long, so I'm skipping that bothersome mess.  It's not too tough to do, just a chore.  So I'm eliminating the chore.

I don't plan on making any other versions with different amounts required to craft.  If you want something like that, ask another mod author.  I'll give them permission make a fork, change the values and re-post, so long as they add me as a contributor on the mod.
author: Dracahn
